resources.string: Attention! You need copy recovery image - "asl.img" file from computer to your SD Card and after it press on "FIX IT" button and wait.

Available three file operations with asl.img file: 
 1) Check - compare SHA-1 sum of the asl.img file with original. 
 2) Remove - delete asl.img from DATA partition. 
 3) Copy - create duplicate asl.img in DATA partition using asl.img from SD Card.
In DATA partition and SD Card

ASL Monitor is app for looking ASL log files (protocol) and control recovery image. 
 On the main screen display info about last checking history as ASL Protocol, Detected modifications and ASL Permissions config. Also you can see in bottom info about asl.img (if it not exist in DATA Partition or SD Card) 
 In Menu screen you can select "Operations with recovery image" item. It is screen where you can check SHA-1 sum, remove from DATA and copy to DATA from SD Card asl.img. 
 In "Options" screen you can set SHA-1 checking parameters 
 Press "Exit" item for exit from app.
